author: ameliaaaaaaaaaaa
content: if Iâ€™m participating permissionlessly can I still submit a proposal? Will anyone look at it?

author: tmiychao
content: Of course, anyone can submit a project and work on it. But as I mentioned before, proposals are due in the second phase of the fellowship, ~6 weeks from now. Use the time to research the project and specify it well to make sure it's in a good state to execute on
